name: Zimbo - Free Crypto Game
description:
Zimbo is a Free-To-Play and Play-To-Earn game based on the classic Rock Paper Scissors.

You can play it for free, you can earn $ZIMBO cryptocurrency as a reward for different actions in the game, and you can earn and trade NFTs in the upcoming Marketplace.

Zimbo works on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC).

Play the Game  -  Read the Whitepaper
